title: Anthocyanins from pomegranate peel (Punica granatum), chili pepper fruit (Capsicum annuum), and bougainvillea flowers (Bougainvillea spectabilis) with multiple biofunctions: Antibacterial, antioxidant, and anticancer
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Kholoud N. Abdelrahman, Abdel Ghany A. Abdel Ghany, Refaat A. Saber, Ali Osman, Basel Sitohy, Mahmoud Sitohy
